```{r}
library(ganttrify)
wp<-c("Data","Data","Data","Shiny App", "Shiny App")
activity <- c("1.1 Cleaning", "1.2 Analysis", "1.3 Visualisation","2.1 Intergration","2.2 Front end")

dates<-c("08/11/2021","15/11/2021","22/11/2021","29/11/2021","29/11/2021")
dates2<-c("15/11/2021","29/11/2021","06/12/2021","20/12/2021"," 20/12/2021")
 
start_date<- as.Date(dates, "%d/%m/%y" )
end_date<- as.Date(dates2, "%d/%m/%y")
project<- tibble(wp, activity, start_date,end_date )

ganttrify(project = project,
          project_start_date = "2021-11",
          font_family = "Roboto Condensed",exact_date=TRUE
        )

```
